"About MC Merge Manager"
"MC Merge Manager is a scouting app for the 2016 FIRST Robotics Competition game "Stronghold"."
"MC Merge Manager is developed and maintained by FRC Team 2706 "Merge Conflict". This project is open source and can be found at\n\t\t\twww.github.com/FRC2706/MCMergeManager."
"\n\nSyncing Data"
"Team Photos are synced to **somewhere, we haven\'t decided where yet**"
"\n\nLocal Data"
"MC Merge Manager keeps a copy of all data in the root of your phone\'s USB storage (the storage you can see when you connect it to a computer by USB, located at /sdcard on internal file viewers). This is done so that a manual file sync / backep by USB can be done for devices that do not have WiFi or Bluetooth connectivity. If you uninstall the app, you will need to manually remove these files."
